Title: I'm Crazy About Iris Blond
Actors: Carlo Verdone, Claudia Gerini, Andréa Ferréol
Plot: Romeo, a lovelorn Roman musician in his 40s with 20 years since his only hit, consults a fortuneteller who predicts he'll find love and money with a foreign singer named for a flower. In Brussels he meets Marguerite, an older chan...
